extendedInfo.description: Happy BirthDay is just a simple way to send to your friends a funny message on his b'day. You have lots of different messages.  Happy birthday contains lots of messages and you can navigate through them and select the one you are looking for.Choose between SMS, Email, Facebook, Twitter or WhatsApp !!! You can also copy the messages to the clipboard and send them by any other service. - SMS- Email- WhatsApp- TwitterNice, Cool, Simple, and FREE.Try it out!!!
